alert.note: Alert for Mellette; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 7:48PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN TODD...TRIPP AND EAST CENTRAL MELLETTE COUNTIES THROUGH 930 PM CDT... At 848 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Mosher to 4 miles south of Carter to near Norden. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Millboro, Witten, and Clearfield around 855 PM CDT. Dog Ear Lake around 900 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Winner, Ideal, Ideal South Housing and Wewela. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
